scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:MapBooks_BrowseMapBooks_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:MapBooks_BrowseMapBooks_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" /> <property id="showTitleColumn" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowTitle_Map" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="showGroupColumn" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowGroup_Map" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> <property id="showPostsColumn" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="showLastPostColumn" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="group" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Group" dataType="Custom" defaultValue="Group=-1" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.GroupSelectionList, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" includeCurrentGroup="true" /> <property id="groupAndSubGroups" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_GroupAndSubGroups" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> <property id="itemsBeforeScroll" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ItemsToShow" dataType="int" defaultValue=""> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" minValue="1" maxValue="100" /> </property> <property id="defaultSortOrder" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_DefaultSortOrder" dataType="string" defaultValue="ApplicationName"> <propertyValue value="ApplicationName" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ApplicationName" /> <propertyValue value="Posts" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Posts" /> <propertyValue value="LastPost" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_LastPost" /> </property> <property id="includeGroupName" resourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_IncludeGroupName" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Displays a browse control to view all maps on the site.
Show data from Group and all Subgroups
Include current group's name in Title (Title must be a formatted string with a {0} placeholder)
